1.0.0.name: wordpress/jetpack-post-statistic-link-plugin
1.0.0.description:
Adds a custom column to the Posts Admin page that provides a link to the JetPack Statistics for each post on your blog.

Pre-Requisite:

  • You must have Jetpack installed and active on your wordpress blog.
  • First released against Jetpack version 1.2.4.
  • Tested to work with JetPack 2.1.1
